products.name: Monochrome Signature Shirt
products.description: Structured cotton shirt with contrast stitch details.
products.details: Premium cotton twill, hidden placket, dry clean recommended.

about.title: Our Story
about.body: HEMBIT builds modern clothing with a focused design language rooted in quality and intention.

founder.title: Founder Story
founder.body: HEMBIT was created to merge expressive style with disciplined tailoring for the next generation.

privacy.body: We collect only data needed to fulfill orders and improve service quality.

services.title: Services

hbProductions.title: Inside the HEMBIT Shirt Program
hbProductions.excerpt: Fabric research, fit trials, and final detailing process.
hbProductions.body: Our team develops each shirt through iterative pattern revisions and final garment tests.
